Jedným z nich je aj zmena na poste moderátora - populárny herec Marek Fašiang sa stane prvým mužským moderátorom v histórii šou. Na moderovanie však nebude sám. Okrem neho a hospodára Martina Bagara bude na farmárov jedným očkom dohliadať Alica – umelá inteligencia. Najprevratnejšia novinka na Farme však nezmení tradičný koncept šou. Farmári si stále budú musieť poradiť s drsnými podmienkami na statku, s nedostatkom jedla či manuálnou prácou. Alica sa bude súťažiacim pravidelne prihovárať spoza stola pravdy vo farmárskej kuchyni. Bude s nimi voliť duelantov, odovzdávať im aj odkaz od vypadnutého súťažiaceho a neustále ich sledovať. Keď to vyhodnotí ako potrebné, tak zasiahne. Farmári si budú musieť zvyknúť na to, že Alica, ako umelá inteligencia, nemá žiadne city. Nepozná ani zľutovanie. Za príjemným ženským hlasom sa skrýva silný charakter. Alicina silná stránka sú dáta a čísla. Je výborná v analýzach, o farmároch vie takmer všetko a vždy má pravdu. Za moment dokáže rozlúsknuť konflikty. Pre farmárov bude poriadnym šokom, ktorý v boji o 75-tisíc eur určite nečakali.

programme.title: Sestričky II
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Tibor je prijatý do nemocnice, bola mu diagnostikovaná rakovina prostaty, jeho lekárom sa stáva Filip. Hoci je Eme Tiborova prítomnosť na oddelení veľmi nepríjemná, pokúsi sa o zmier, no Tibor ju svojím správaním vyprovokuje k prudkej reakcii. Dano si Emin kontakt s Tiborom nesprávne vysvetlí a urobí spontánne, ale zásadné rozhodnutie. Tibor zároveň pomstychtivo prezradí Filipovi pravdu o Eminej minulosti a Ema sa tak ocitá vo veľkom strese… Helena navrhuje Vilovi, aby sa stretli s Alicou na spoločnej večeri a zároveň rieši náročný a citlivý prípad týkajúci sa moslimských utečencov z Afganistanu a kultúrnych rozdielov. Táňa prichytí Petrovu dcéru Anabelu pri fajčení trávy a ukáže svoju razantnejšiu tvár. Janine deti prezradia Tomášovi, že sa stretli s Filipom a ten obviní Janu, že ho podvádzala s Filipom ešte pred jeho odchodom do Švajčiarska a myslí si, že práve Filip je dôvodom rozpadu ich manželstva… Celé oddelenie si zároveň šušká o plánovanom príchode nového lekára, ktorého identitu Marta odmieta prezradiť.

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Poklad: Dalibor a Filip Gallovci bývajú na jednom pozemku v dvoch domoch so svojimi rodinami. Vzťahy medzi bratmi nie sú ideálne, zlá atmosféra sa vyhrotí po tom, čo ich deti nájdu na spoločnom pozemku poklad...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Macocha: Táni pred rokmi zomrela matka, a tak sa s manželom Patrikom rozhodli, že otca Igora nasťahujú do svojho domu. Jedného dňa sa Igor rozhodne z domu odsťahovať s odôvodnením, že si našiel novú vážnu známosť...

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí - Akí sme boli
programme.sub-title: Všetko najlepšie z obľúbenej zábavnej relácie
programme.desc: Všetko najlepšie z obľúbenej zábavnej relácie

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí - Best of
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Na telo
programme.desc: Moderátor Michal Kovačič privíta každú nedeľu atraktívnych hostí z radov politikov v diskusii na aktuálne témy, ktoré hýbu Slovenskom.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Krstiny: Stromokocúrovci chystajú krstiny vnuka. Lászlo je sklamaný. Chcel byť krstným otcom, ale teraz pochybuje či sú na krstiny vôbec pozvaní. Nahnevaný dá prerobiť prívesok, ktorí pôvodne kúpil pre Evana. Mladým však "vybuchli" krstní rodičia a treba do druhého dňa nájsť náhradu. Lászlo cíti príležitosť, ale František jeho ponuku asi prepočuje. Zuzana si potrebuje "predtočiť" svoj vlog a chcela by do videa hudobný podmaz. Kto budú nakoniec krstný rodičia? Ako dopadne hudobný doprovod Zuzaninho inštruktážneho videa? Poslúži nakoniec prerobený prívesok?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Hurá na hokej!: František, veľký hokejový fanúšik, daroval Lászlovi vstupenky na 1. zápas Slovenska na Majstrovstvách sveta. Počíta s tým, že László ho berie so sebou. László však vstupenky niekam založil a nevie ich nájsť. Zuzana rieši svoj nový biznis a má dohodnuté stretnutie so Švajdom, aby jej poradil, ako nakrúcať profesionálne videá. Kým Marta nájde virguľou stratené vstupenky, chlapi musia ísť na zápas do Košíc autom, ktoré sa však pokazí. Uvidia László s Františkom aspoň niečo zo zápasu v televízi, keď v dome prebieha aj revízia elektrických rozvodov? Ako dopadne návšteva Patrika Švajdu, keď sa o nej dozvie Marta aj Ildikó, ktorá je jeho nadšený fanúšik?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Jelenia oslava: František sa opäť nezhodne so Zuzanou. Plánovaná oslava jubilea prvej trofeje sa zmení na obed v lacnej poľovníckej reštaurácii. Chlapi dostanú odstupné z Lesnej správy. Susedia chystajú pre Františka prekvapenie, tajne vojdú cez balkón a schovajú sa. Po návrate domov Zuzana v hádke všetkých ohovorí. Vyžehlia sa urážky varením jelenieho gulášu? Františka poteší, že Farkašová nezabudla na jeho výročie. Dozvie sa však, že Lászlove odstupné je nepomerne vyššie ako to jeho. Ako je to možné? Podarí sa zachrániť oslavu jubilea? A ako bude chutiť guláš, ktorý dovarila Ildikó?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Pokušenie. Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Horná Dolná zažije zjavenie! Sestra Angelika v dedine poriadne zamieša karty – nielen mužom, ale aj ženám!

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Náhradník. Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Do Hornej Dolnej prídu Turkovi bratranci. Takže Turek má problém. A okrem nich sa vráti Erikina kamarátka Etela. Takže Ďuro má problém tiež.

programme.title: Sestričky II
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Jana pred nemocnicou nájde opustené bábätko, ku ktorému sa po čase intenzívne hlási otec, no jeho matka a jej osud ostáva dlho nejasný, až do šokujúceho rozuzlenia... Marta sa zrúti na tlačovej konferencii pred novinármi a dočasne stráca pamäť. Jej stav je tragikomický a náročný pre personál celého oddelenia; ukáže sa však, že zaň môžu aj súkromné problémy, ktoré Marta dosiaľ pred kolegami umne tajila... Alica pod zámienkou zláka Vila k sebe domov a neúspešne sa ho pokúsi zviesť. Petrova bývalá manželka Linda si svojou bezprostrednosťou získava sympatie personálu na oddelení a keďže má po príchode na Slovensko problém s bývaním, Táňa sa pod tlakom Petrových detí a proti jeho vôli zasadí za to, aby Linde dočasne pomohli ubytovaním u seba, čo však neskôr trpko oľutuje. Jana sa nestíha aj učiť, aj randiť s Filipom a aj starať o deti. Filip sa čoraz viac zaujíma o Emu, a šokovaná Jana sa stane náhodným svedkom ich prvého bozku…

programme.title: Sestričky II
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Jana začína byť voči Filipovi odťažitá, dôvod si však necháva pre seba a skôr, než sa stihne s Filipom v pokoji pozhovárať, na oddelení vypukne výnimočný stav kvôli pacientovi s exotickým a vysoko nákazlivým vírusom. Marta zúfalo hľadá záchranu pre svojho chorého psíka Žofku. Na riskantný, bizarný zákrok sa napokon podujme doktor Chromík... Alica varuje Helenu pred Vilom, ktorý ju vraj zvádzal. Keď ho Helena konfrontuje, Vilo jej povie pravdu o celej situácii a Alicinej intrige; Helena tomu nechce veriť, no Vilo má našťastie dôkaz. Ema a Filip v rámci bezpečnostných opatrení skončia spolu v izolácii, kde sa starajú jeden o druhého. Jana vidí ich zbližovanie a trápi sa tým. Táni sa podarí konečne dostať rozpínavú Lindu z ich bytu, no je jasné, že od tejto chvíle medzi nimi zúri otvorená vojna.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Macocha: Táni pred rokmi zomrela matka, a tak sa s manželom Patrikom rozhodli, že otca Igora nasťahujú do svojho domu. Jedného dňa sa Igor rozhodne z domu odsťahovať s odôvodnením, že si našiel novú vážnu známosť...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Zámienka: Laura sa pred siedmimi rokmi vydala do váženej rodiny primára Meláka, ktorý vládne tvrdou rukou celej rodine. Nedá dopustiť len na vnuka Romanka. Nešťastná udalosť mu nahrá do karát - Lauru chce od Romanka odstrihnúť a zneužije na to aj svojho syna...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Zaslepená láska: Marta patrí medzi ženy, ktoré veria na lásku. Krátko po dramatickom rozvode spoznáva nového suseda – Marcela. Napriek varovaniu sestry mu bezvýhradne dôveruje, hoci mnohé okolnosti naznačujú, že s Marcelom nebude všetko v poriadku...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Dealer: Dušan je vdovec, sám vychováva deti Alicu a Olivera. Snaží sa im dať to najlepšie, no niekedy nie je pre neho ľahké skĺbiť prácu s rodinou. Všetko sa skomplikuje, keď sa do susedstva prisťahuje mladík, ktorý sa správa na prvý pohľad čudne. A Alica sa s ním začne stretávať...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Sťahovanie: František so Zuzanou sa presťahovali, ešte nemajú všetky veci v novom byte a už sú tu komplikácie. László oslavuje 50-tku a spolu s Ildikó sa vracajú po desiatich rokoch do Bratislavy. Susedia sú na seba urazení a za celý ten čas sa nekontaktovali. Udobria sa? Bude oslava? A ak áno, tak kde vlastne?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Profesor (alebo Lászlo pomáha): Lászlo chce urovnať vzťahy, lebo Zuzana sa mu zdá nervózna, že opäť bývajú v jednej bytovke. Nepotešili by Zuzku nové prsia? Známosť s plastickým chirurgom bude konečne užitočná. Lenže Zuzana skôr potrebuje známosť na maďarskej škole, chce sa zavďačiť dôležitému zákazníkovi, ktorého dvojičky tam majú problémy. Keďže sa toho chopí Lászlo ako vždy všetko dopadne inak ako bolo naplánované. A nakoniec chlapom vyrazí dych nečakaná návšteva, Marta Sladká. Prišla len na krátku návštevu, alebo je za tým aj niečo iné?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Výročník: Lászlo má problém, musí oznámiť Ildikó, že Sladká je opäť ich susedka. Lenže dnes majú okrúhle výročie ťuťu-muťu a naozaj sa to nehodí. František už tiež nechce ďalej tajiť Martinu prítomnosť, a tak tlačí na Lászla a sľubuje mu pomoc. Odvahu si dodávajú alkoholom a keď Ildi nájde kožuch, ktorý omylom považuje za darček k výročiu veci naberú rýchly a zamotaný spád. Vo dvojici po opici budú nakoniec veľmi prekvapení.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Kandidát: František zistí, že ulica spisuje petíciu za výrub topoľov. Škriabanie v krku však nie je, minimálne v ich domácnosti, spôsobené alergiou. Zradený vlastnou manželkou aj susedmi musí František situáciu riešiť razantným krokom. Bude kandidovať za poslanca v miestnych voľbách! László aj Ildikó mu veľmi chcú pomôcť. Situáciu však skomplikuje nielen Lászlom vlastnoručne opravený defibrilátor, ale aj kolegyňa Ildikó, ktorá má veľmi vplyvného manžela!

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Voľby: Je deň volieb a František je z Lászlovej kampane zdrvený. Veď nikto ani netuší, že vôbec kandiduje. Ildikó tvrdí, že u nich straší a chce kňaza na vysvätenie bytu. Zuzana má kontakt vo volebnej komisii, ale výsledky do poslednej chvíle zatajuje. Pozná však exorcistu, ktorý prečistí negatívnu energiu prítomnú v dome. Františkova depresia vážne ohrozí jeho priateľstvo s Lászlom. Podarí sa Františkovi dosiahnuť post poslanca, zmiznú nečisté sily a prežijú všetci príchod mimoriadneho Martinho hosťa, alebo snáď jeho ducha?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Poistka. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Ema si konečne nájde prácu. Lacko sa musí vysporiadať so sokom v láske.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Magazín. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Erika získa možnosť dostať sa do exkluzívnej rubriky "lájfstájlového" časopisu. Ďuro z toho nemá radosť. A chlpáči nemajú za čo piť...

programme.title: Smotánka
programme.sub-title: Nevšedný svet kľúčovou dierkou
programme.desc: Spoločenské akcie, honosné večierky a zábavné párty - miesta, kde sa bežný smrteľník len tak ľahko nedostane, ale s našou kamerou je možné nahliadnuť na miesta, kde to vrie zábavou, nádhernými róbami a známymi tvárami. Najaktuálnejšie dianie v spoločenskom živote, svet recepcií a večierkov, exkluzívne rozhovory s celebritami a tie najnovšie pikošky - vyberte sa so Smotánkou do prostredia „horných desaťtisíc"! Relácia, v ktorej vás svetom smotánky sprevádza šarmantná moderátorka Erika Judínyová.

programme.title: Sestričky II
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Tibor je prijatý do nemocnice, bola mu diagnostikovaná rakovina prostaty, jeho lekárom sa stáva Filip. Hoci je Eme Tiborova prítomnosť na oddelení veľmi nepríjemná, pokúsi sa o zmier, no Tibor ju svojím správaním vyprovokuje k prudkej reakcii. Dano si Emin kontakt s Tiborom nesprávne vysvetlí a urobí spontánne, ale zásadné rozhodnutie. Tibor zároveň pomstychtivo prezradí Filipovi pravdu o Eminej minulosti a Ema sa tak ocitá vo veľkom strese… Helena navrhuje Vilovi, aby sa stretli s Alicou na spoločnej večeri a zároveň rieši náročný a citlivý prípad týkajúci sa moslimských utečencov z Afganistanu a kultúrnych rozdielov. Táňa prichytí Petrovu dcéru Anabelu pri fajčení trávy a ukáže svoju razantnejšiu tvár. Janine deti prezradia Tomášovi, že sa stretli s Filipom a ten obviní Janu, že ho podvádzala s Filipom ešte pred jeho odchodom do Švajčiarska a myslí si, že práve Filip je dôvodom rozpadu ich manželstva… Celé oddelenie si zároveň šušká o plánovanom príchode nového lekára, ktorého identitu Marta odmieta prezradiť.

programme.title: Sestričky II
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Na oddelenie prichádza matka so synom, ktorý má psychické problémy, ale odmieta sa liečiť. Sestričky jej vysvetľujú, aké obmedzené možnosti majú v takejto situácii a apelujú na matku, aby ona sama skúsila syna presvedčiť o nutnosti liečby… Ukáže sa však, že je už neskoro a chlapcov psychický stav spôsobí veľkú tragédiu. Filip operoval Tibora, prepúšťajú ho z nemocnice. Marta predstavuje novú lekárku, je to bývalá Petrova manželka Linda. Táňa neverí Petrovi, že o tom nevedel. Je presvedčená, že sa Linda vrátila, aby ho získala späť. Kvôli nehode autobusu a množstve zranených vzniká na oddelení krízový režim a Helena tak zmešká dohodnutú spoločnú večeru s Alicou a Vilom. Ukáže sa však, že tí dvaja si aj bez nej prekvapivo rozumejú… Ema podcení situáciu a stav jedného zo zranených, čo má za následok smrť pacienta. Ema má výčitky svedomia, ktoré svojou reakciou ešte vybičuje Peter a naopak, upokojuje ju Filip, ktorý v poslednom čase venuje Eme viac pozornosti než kedykoľvek predtým, čo sa čoraz menej pozdáva Jane.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Dvojaký život: Martin už roky pracuje vo veľkej stavebnej firme na pozícii, vďaka ktorej pendluje medzi Žilinou a Bratislavou. Partnerka, ktorá býva aj s jeho dcérkou v Žiline, je nespokojná a chce sa presťahovať do Bratislavy. Tomu sa však Martin vehementne bráni...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Manželka: Mária je ženou v domácnosti, jej manžel pôsobí ako úspešný financník v medzinárodnej spolocnosti. Spolu vychovávajú desatrocného syna Riška. Márii sa však pohodlný život zdá byt zrejme nudný, pretože sa zapletie s mladším chlapom...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Modelka: Rozvedená Andrea v poslednom čase má čoraz väčšie problémy pri výchove svojej neprispôsobivej dospievajúcej dcéry Niny. Tá prestane chodiť do školy a rozhodne sa vydať na dráhu modelky. Fotograf, ktorý ju chce presláviť, je otcov známy...

programme.title: Varte s nami
programme.desc: Kulinárska relácia s receptami, tipmi a trikmi šéfkuchára Marcela Ihnačáka a cukrárky Veroniky Bušovej! Čakajú vás neoceniteľné tipy a tajné triky, ako rýchlo a jednoducho pripravíte hotový gurmánsky zážitok, ale i recepty dvoch majstrov varešky, ktorými Marcel a Veronika nepochybne sú...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Striakiller: Chlapom "prihára", v rodinách chýbajú peniaze a ženy netušia, že výplata z mestského úradu už nikdy nepríde. V bytovke sa podpisuje petícia proti prerábaniu pivničných priestorov - je jasné, že sa to deje bez oficiálneho povolenia a navyše všetkým lezie na nervy hluk a špina. Ildikó má problém s menom František pre svoje dieťa. Niekedy nevie či Lászlo telefonuje s kamarátom, alebo sa prihovára ich nenarodenému synovi. Zuzana využíva na reklamu krému proti striám aj vlastného vnuka. Lászlo chce do večera dokončiť prerábku, aby priestor mohli konečne ukázať manželkám a ku všetkému sa priznať. Podarí sa im presvedčiť Zuzanu a Ildikó, že si zaslúžia novú šancu v živote aj v manželstve? A čo je v obálkach s doručenými výpoveďami z mestského úradu navyše?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Chatamari: Ildikó zmizla. Lászlo verí, že sa vráti, keď sa reštaurácia dobre rozbehne. Andrejka navrhuje, aby pozvali známeho amerického "foodblogera", ak dostanú dobré hodnotenie, budú sa k nim ľudia len tak hrnúť. Musia však stihnúť otvoriť reštauráciu do večera, lebo pán Peddington odlieta do Ameriky. Lászlo maká o dušu a František si požičiava nábytok z vlastného bytu aj od mamičky, aby mohli urýchlene otvoriť. Podarí sa im otvoriť reštauráciu včas? Kam odišla Ildikó? Akú recenziu napíše Jimmy P. a kde sa vlastne vzala špecialita "Chatamari" až z Kathmandu, na jedálnom lístku Poľovníckej reštaurácie s detským kútikom a ruskou čajovňou?

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Dagmar žije v Šali spolu so svojou 16-ročnou dcérou Karolínou. Veľmi ju trápi, že už neuveriteľných 17 rokov nenavštívila svojich rodičov. Tvrdí, že otec ju nechcel pustiť ani len do brány rodinného domu a rodina sa od nej nepochopiteľne odtiahla. Dagmar si preto zavolala profesionálnu svokru Gizku Oňovú, aby jej pomohla udobriť sa s rodičmi a po dlhých rokoch napraviť vážne narušené medziľudské vzťahy. Gizka však zistí, že najmä Dagmar má maslo na hlave a závažných problémov v jej živote je ešte omnoho viac...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Modelka: Rozvedená Andrea v poslednom čase má čoraz väčšie problémy pri výchove svojej neprispôsobivej dospievajúcej dcéry Niny. Tá prestane chodiť do školy a rozhodne sa vydať na dráhu modelky. Fotograf, ktorý ju chce presláviť, je otcov známy...

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Stávka II. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: František a László sa rozlúčili so svojimi fúzami a tie im pomaly dorastajú. Blíži sa čas dušičiek a Zuzana chce toto obdobie zúročiť v predaji pohrebných vencov. Nikto jej však nechce tento morbídny tovar uskladniť. László ochotne ponúkne svoju garáž, no Ildikó sa to nepáči. V tejto časti si zahrali aj živé korytnačky, ktoré chová František.

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Sebiho psychológ odmietne Norinu ponuku, no tá sa mu začne vyhrážať jeho vlastným synom. Žák oklame Igora, že Katka je stále na rizikovom tehotenstve. Juraj v strachu pred políciou požiada o pomoc Kristiána.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nebožtíci: Peter a Táňa nedávno pochovali svojho posledného príbuzného - strýka Karola. Ten im odkázal starší dom, do ktorého sa rozhodli presťahovať. To však ešte netušili, že do čoho všetkého ich nebohý strýko namočil...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Macocha: Táni pred rokmi zomrela matka, a tak sa s manželom Patrikom rozhodli, že otca Igora nasťahujú do svojho domu. Jedného dňa sa Igor rozhodne z domu odsťahovať s odôvodnením, že si našiel novú vážnu známosť...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Nora bude úspešne pokračovať v pláne získať Sebiho do svojej opatery. Roman si uvedomí, že Nora sa mu vzďaľuje. Oľga mu poradí, aby to s ňou skončil. Igor si všimne, že Katka pred ním niečo tají.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Vernosť až za hrob: Päťdesiatnik Martin a o dvadsať rokov mladšia Jana sú manželmi vyše dvoch rokov. On je majiteľom úspešnej firmy, kde sa spoznal s novou láskou. Jeho jediná dcéra Denisa si s macochou príliš nerozumie, pretože si myslí, že sa snaží otca iba využiť. Preto ju o to viac prekvapí rozhodnutie, ktoré sa otec chystá urobiť...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Najlepšia: Pätnásťročná Monika je bystré dievča, ale žiaden génius. V poslednom čase sa jej školské výsledky trochu zhoršili, pretože sa zamilovala do spolužiaka Filipa. Jej matka Kata je však až nezdravo ambiciózna a neustále Moniku porovnáva so spolužiačkou. Udalosti zájdu až tak ďaleko, že Monika sa dostane do zúfalej situácie...

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Obľúbená reality šou Farma je späť! Neuveriteľná 14. séria sa opäť predstaví v originálnom novom koncepte a s množstvom zaujímavých prekvapení. Jedným z nich je aj zmena na poste moderátora - populárny herec Marek Fašiang sa stane prvým mužským moderátorom v histórii šou. Na moderovanie však nebude sám. Okrem neho a hospodára Martina Bagara bude na farmárov jedným očkom dohliadať Alica – umelá inteligencia. Najprevratnejšia novinka na Farme však nezmení tradičný koncept šou. Farmári si stále budú musieť poradiť s drsnými podmienkami na statku, s nedostatkom jedla či manuálnou prácou. Alica sa bude súťažiacim pravidelne prihovárať spoza stola pravdy vo farmárskej kuchyni. Bude s nimi voliť duelantov, odovzdávať im aj odkaz od vypadnutého súťažiaceho a neustále ich sledovať. Keď to vyhodnotí ako potrebné, tak zasiahne. Farmári si budú musieť zvyknúť na to, že Alica, ako umelá inteligencia, nemá žiadne city. Nepozná ani zľutovanie. Za príjemným ženským hlasom sa skrýva silný charakter. Alicina silná stránka sú dáta a čísla. Je výborná v analýzach, o farmároch vie takmer všetko a vždy má pravdu. Za moment dokáže rozlúsknuť konflikty. Pre farmárov bude poriadnym šokom, ktorý v boji o 75-tisíc eur určite nečakali.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.desc: Power & Primates. Hope discovers a horrifying problem in Costa Rica where man and monkey cross paths.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (4)

Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Missing Teddy. Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: Hot Air Toad. Toad boasts he can get to the seaside in his hot air ballon and be back in time for his grand dinner. He soon gets into trouble and crash lands in the Wild Woods. Trapped in the ropes and branches of trees, Toad is helpless to stop the weasels marching on Toad Hall.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Magic Mirror. Hildie and Beatie bring home a fortune telling magic mirror. When it shows Tom a future he doesn't like he tries everything to avoid it. In fact everything that Tom does seems to avoid his future seems to make it worse. No amount of magic can change Tom's luck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Bone Dry. Spike comes to Tom and Jerry for help finding his missing bones. The detectives investigate a community garden and it seems like their number one suspect is an elusive gopher. It turns out that Tyke dug up all of his dad's bones and was saving them as a birthday present for Spike.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cheesy Ball Run. Tom, Jerry and Butch watch a Smack-n-Cheese Cheesy Cheese Puffs commercial and when they hear the words "Supplies are running out," the trio's rivalry reaches new heights as they compete to get what they imagine to be the very last bag of the snack food.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A New Friend. Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Lift. Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dig This. Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. Trying to make Mrs Wicket aware of the danger and save Scrapper and Teddy from being blown to smithereens takes courage nerve and a Bean styled homemade bomb disposal kit.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Hypnotised. Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Into the Woods. When an accident leaves Jerry wrapped head to toe in bandages and unable to take his scout troop camping, a guilt-ridden Tom decides to lead the kids into the woods himself. Stuck at home, Jerry can't help but imagine everything that could possibly go wrong.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Ball of Fire. The hot dog relish that Crooked Eddie brings to the detectives turns out to be an explosive device that Tom & Jerry must now return to the lab before it inadvertently blows up the entire city.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Sleeping King. When the Queen reluctantly takes Charlie to Frostaland so he can take part in the traditional “Cherry-Choc Harvest,” she finds the King fast asleep, due to a blunder committed by Alice. But instead of helping Alice and Lewis find an antidote to break the magic spell he’s under, the monarch throws every monkey wrench she can possibly get her hands on into the works! Truth is: she’s jealous of Charlie’s affection for the King of Frostaland.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Lewis' Shadow. Lewis’ shadow becomes detached when Alice accidentally shuts the door behind her rabbit friend a little too fast! Alice finds it super funny. Lewis, on the other hand, is freaking out: his shadow’s a bit too facetious for his liking, not to mention the fact that Queen has a rule against shadows coming off! Unfortunately, the shadow has a mind of its own and the monarch soon finds out. When Alice and Lewis get grounded because of it, the rabbit blames his shadow. But when the latter comes to their rescue, he realizes he misjudged it. In fact, he actually grows pretty fond of it in the end!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Teatime on the Moon. Following a mess-up by Alice, the Queen shamelessly decides to hold her teatime ritual on the Moon, without asking its permission. During this “incursion,” Alice & Lewis do all they can to keep the satellite and its odd inhabitants (Moon-Cutie-Twees, who clean the moon all year round) from being disturbed. But unfortunately, the Queen gets it into her head to build a “vacation home” on the Moon! There’s only one way to get her out of there: her castle must be invaded!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: A Joker for a Queen. Jojo, one of the King of Frostaland’s joker cards, looks on in awe as Queen skillfully guides her procession of cards with a snap of her fingers! When the King responds with his own parade, however, he lets his cards do whatever they please, leaving poor Jojo clueless. This prompts her to decide to leave Frostaland and head off to train in Wonderland, to be part of the Queen’s parade. Noticing how sad the King is to see his joker card go, Alice and Lewis do everything they can to persuade Jojo to return. But in so doing, they too find themselves enrolled alongside the Queen’s cards!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Funny Voices. The bugs talk about doing funny voices.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Mighty Mike

Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Electric Turtles. The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house. Mike gets locked outside by the raccoons who were freezing their little butts off in their lair. By the time Mike gets back inside all hell has broken loose, but Mike might have figured out how he can get rid of the raccoons and de-electrify the turtles at the same time.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Trying. The bugs talk about trying new things.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hypnosis. Mike wakes up in the bathtub, huh? The house has been turned upside down and the other animals are being weird. They're acting like zombies and carrying food out of the house. Our pug discovers that the raccoons have hypnotised Fluffy, the turtles, and Iris, and are using them to transport the contents of the Mikkelsens fridge to their lair. Our hero will need to confront Iris to save her from the raccoon's dastardly scheme... and refill the Mikkelson's fridge!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time

They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Just Plane Nuts. Rick and Ginger are going on a vacation and bringing Tom and Spike aboard the plane. Stowaways Jerry and Tuffy are also along for the ride and things go awry when all the pets start chasing each other on the plane. Rick and Ginger are oblivious that their pets are annoying the entire plane.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Pets Not Welcome. When Rick and Ginger sneak Tom and Spike into a hotel where pets are not allowed they make the pets promise they won't leave the hotel room! Too bad Jerry and Tuffy want to explore and have fun. The pets run rampant through the hotel while being chased by the hotel manager. They manage to trash the hotel and get kicked out of their paradise vacation.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Smitten with the Kitten. Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster until she finds it a forever home. Everyone in the house falls in love with the kitten, except for Tom. When Spike and Jerry see that Tom has become a bad influence on the kitten, a dragged-out fight ensues. The only thing that ends it is the news that the kitten has a new home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cruisin' for a Bruisin'. Rick and Ginger take Tom and Butch on a cruise ship. Jerry and Tuffy leave to explore the ship's buffet and leave Spike and Tom in the room. They all meet Meathead a vicious ship cat who will stop at nothing to terrorize the four of them. They all band together to defeat Meathead but not before they wreak havoc on the ship.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Road Trippin'. Rick and Ginger take Tom and Spike on a road trip to Ginger's aunt's house. Spike is terrorized by a dog traveling in a trailer. Tom and Spike get left behind at a pit stop and must travel with the Hannibal the mean trailer dog. They must escape and find their way back to Rick and Ginger. Jerry and Tuffy cause problems when they get caught in Rick and Ginger's suitcase.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Caring Bean. Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Opera Bean. Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Taxi Bean. Mr Bean takes a taxi to his local toyshop but a dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Mr Bean for a ride. After a mix up Mr Bean finds himself driving the taxi and starts to have fun couriering people to their destinations even giving an American tourist an extensive tour of London. But will the taxi driver find out what’s been going on and how much will Bean’s final fare be?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Muscle Bean. Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Ball of Fame. When Tom and Jerry's antics unearth an autographed baseball – a childhood souvenir of Rick's – he warns Tom to keep his paws off it, or else! Tom attempts to obey, but Jerry's got other ideas and the ball gets out of hand. The guys chase the treasured ball all over the neighborhood, recovering it only to lose it again. And again. And again.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Trainee Book-Wizards. Before heading off on a trip to find new seeds, the Book-Wizard entrusts his garden to his new apprentices, Alice and Lewis. But it’s a pretty stressful experience: besides having to tend to the garden, they also have to answer the Twins when they come to ask for advice, and entertain the Queen when she decides to turn up unannounced, for teatime! And when Charlie gets whisked away by a bird-book, it’s panic-stations for the two apprentices. In fact, things get so out of hand that they have to call the Book-Wizard to the rescue!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Heel! What a disaster!: the Queen’s favorite booties have gone missing! And if Alice and Lewis don’t find them, they’re going to have to shine all fifty-thirteen other pairs of shoes in her majesty’s possession! Hot on the heels of the mischievous boots, our two heroes must use clever tactics to persuade them to get back to the Queen’s feet!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Too Young. When Alice and Lewis go to the Valley of the Night to look for MooMoo wool, they run into Queen and Charlie. When the little prince asks if he can go with the girl and her rabbit friend, the Queen begrudgingly agrees, and orders the two friends to take good care of her nephew. Charlie is ecstatic to be able to go on a “big boy’s adventure!” But is brought down to Earth with a bang when he finds out his aunt has been following them on the quiet. Feeling betrayed, he decides to run away.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Frost Ball. The King of Frostaland invites the Queen to a “frost ball” in his realm. Eager to look good, the Wonderland monarch appoints Lewis to open the ball, and threatens to remove him as clockmaster should he mess up! The poor rabbit must now set about learning the art of “tea-skating,” a kind of ice-skating on teapots! Only problem is, he’s scared of taking the plunge and decides to listen to Dodson’s advice (the dodo’s taken on the role of self-appointed coach) instead of simply trying it out himself. Needless to say, Dodson exploits the situation to get extra special treatment. So Alice steps in, determined to do whatever it takes to bring Lewis to his senses.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Family. The bugs talk about their families.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: The Big Laugh. Declan upsets Lu and Barnaby when he doesn't play by the rules.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Packing For France. The bugs help a new bug to feel welcome in Shell School.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Baby Horsefly. Lu upsets Elodie when she laughs at an involuntary noise she makes.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Nature. The bugs talk about nature.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: Otter Disaster. Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters’ holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Turn About. Butch locks Tom in the basement to keep him from attending a date with Toodles. When Butch shows up instead Toodles suprises him with babysitting her misbehaving nieces and nephews. Tom tries to escape from the basement but keeps getting blocked by Jerry and Tuffy who think it's a monster downstairs.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Plight Before Christmas. Tom accidentally puts a spell on Santa that transforms him into a cookie. When he can't figure out how to transform him back Tom and Jerry volunteer to help Santa deliver gifts. A Christmas miracle occurs when Tom and Jerry sacrifice their own gifts for each other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The Paper Airplane Chase. Tom is determined to hijack the fun Jerry and Tuffy are having making paper airplanes, but the hijinks take a turn for the worse when Tom realizes he's made a paper airplane out of Ginger's great-great-grandmother's treasured fruitcake recipe.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tuffy Love. Jerry and Tuffy are getting ready to go to a family reunion and they're mailing themselves off! Unfortunately Tuffy gets left behind. Although Tom Thinks Tuffy is easy pickings he's in for a surprise as Tuffy makes his life really difficult. Jerry races back home when he realizes he left Tuffy behind.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Poof. Tom and Jerry are hired by a bad magician to find out where his pigeon friend disappeared during a magic trick gone wrong. Their investigation leads them to discover the pigeon. Unfortunately he really believes his friend has magic powers and is waiting for magic to bring him back. At the end of the day it's the power of friendship that solves this case.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Scout Bean. Mr Bean inadvertently causes an accident which prevents Irma taking the scout troop to Big Bear’s Scout Camp. With the scout master and mini bus out of action Mr Bean steps in to save the day. As temporary scoutmaster Mr Bean enjoys his new role but his obsessive badge collecting wins him no friends within the group.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Back To School. Mr Bean cannot find anywhere to park other than the space he spots in a school’s car park. There’s a case of mistaken identity and Mr Bean finds himself teaching a class of unruly school kids. Bean uses every trick in the book to win them over and ends up teaching the headmaster how to be a success in school.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Lord Bean. Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wars. Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch: Bug Nollig
programme.desc: Lu can't wait to celebrate Bug Nollig with her friends and family, especially her new baby cousin.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Birthdays. The bugs talk about birthdays.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Hip Replacement. The neighbor's cat turns out to be a hipster whose laidback attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed, Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Day Star. It’s the Night of the Stars in Wonderland and Lewis invites Alice to see the show. Afterwards, our two friends make an unexpected encounter in the garden: they find a little star that’s eager to see daytime! Alice is only too happy to help it fulfill its dream. But when it starts gradually losing its star dust, they realize there’s a risk it might not be able to rise back into the sky to shine once again alongside its relatives. Alice and Lewis must prevent that danger from occurring, ASAP! And so off they head to the Valley of the Night!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Tooth the Rescue! When one of Lewis’ teeth falls out, no little tooth fairy comes to see him. Instead, the whole of Wonderland converges upon him! Basically, in this world, a loose tooth is an opportunity for making a wish, which makes it a very sought-after commodity among the Wonderlanders!! In the midst of all this squabbling, Alice must use cunning to help her good friend Lewis hold onto his precious tooth!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Journey to the Moon. While delivering a yummy stew to the Queen, Alice and Lewis notice the moon is crying and that its falling tears are flooding the castle! Afraid her royal residence is about to collapse any minute, Queen orders Alice and Lewis to find a solution to this problem on the double! And so off they go to the moon, where a whole plethora of surprises awaits them.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Seam Stress. Today, Queen has decided to commission a unique dress from her talented Seamstress Card: she wants it made out of wild thread – a very difficult one to tame! And should her Seamstress Card fail to pull it off, she will be relieved of her duties on the spot! Alice and Lewis jump to it, coming up with all kinds of bright ideas to help out the poor card. As a result, in the end, a whole cat walk of dresses awaits the Queen!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Nature. The bugs talk about nature.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.
